name: Call Introduction
desc: The first 5 - 30 seconds of the call, the customer is greeted and verified.

name: Process & Procedure
desc: The bulk of the call; depending on the customer's issue it will be resolved or a follow-up expectation is set.

name: Soft Skills
desc: Crtieria used throughout the call to establish a unified company voice.

name: Close of Call
desc: The 30 - 60 seconds of the call, issue/resolution is summarized and the customer leaves the call knowing what comes next.

name: Call Introduction
desc: The first 5 - 30 seconds of the call, the customer is greeted and we have established the reason for calling.

name: Process & Procedure
desc: The bulk of the call; customer receives all information pertaining to the reason for the call.

desc: Crtieria used throughout the call to establish a unified company voice.

name: Close of Call
desc: The 30 - 60 seconds of the call, reason for the call is summarized and next steps are clarified, if applicable.

name: Email Introduction
desc: Sets the tone of the email and establishes a connection with the recipient right from the start. Agent strikes a balance between being professional and friendly.

name: Email Process & Procedure
desc: The Agent conveys the message and provides value to the customer. Agent remains concise, writes conversationally, and delivers relevant content.

name: Soft Skills
desc: Crtieria used throughout the email displays thoughtful use of the company's tone guidelines.

name: Complimentary Close
desc: The Agent delivers a sense of closure and leaves a positive impression on the customer. Where applicable, a clear and easy-to-understand call to action is delivered.
